3.「アーニア よく聞け。| お前の修練の成果や 実力を かんがみて| 次の研究発表: Ernesto... In light of your training and|abilities, if you fail to produce results in|your next research presentation...

4.「お前を この研究院から| 追放することが 決定した。: I've decided to expel you from this|institute...

7.「……努力する者は 支援する。| だが 個人的 かつ 感傷的な理由で| 歩みを止:
... I support those who work hard... But|there is no place in the Institute for those|who stop for personal and sentimental|
|reasons...

8.「アーニア……。お前は 神に見放されず| 大病から 奇跡的に 回復したのだ。|:
Ernesto... You were miraculously recovered|from a serious illness... without being|abandoned by the gods. You know what you have|
|to do...

9.<if_woman>「おかげさまで 無事に ここまで来れたわ。| ありがとね <: <if_woman>Thanks to you, we've made it this far...|Thank you.<cs_pchero>...<else>Thanks to you, we've made it this far...|Thank you.<cs_pchero>I'll be back.<endif>

10.「ここ 前に シェリルと来たことがあったの。| だから もしかして……って思った: I've been here before with Cheryl, so... So|maybe... I thought maybe she was here, but I|knew she had to be.

11.<if_woman>「とりあえず 研究用の素材を 採ってくるね。| <cs_pc: <if_woman>In the meantime, I've been collecting|materials for my research...<cs_pchero>You wait there...<else>In the meantime, I've been collecting|materials for my research...<cs_pchero>He was waiting there.<endif>

13.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん お願い！| このオバケを な: <if_woman><cs_pchero>Please! Do something about this freak!<else><cs_pchero>Please! Do something about this freak!<endif>

14.<if_woman>「おかげさまで 無事に ここまで来れたわ。| ありがとね <: <if_woman>Thanks to you, we've made it this far...|Thank you.<cs_pchero>...<else>Thanks to you, we've made it this far...|Thank you.<cs_pchero>I'll be back.<endif>

15.「あのオバケ 今日は いないようね……。| お留守にしてるのかな？: I don't think that wacko's here today. Maybe|he's not home?

17.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん お願い！| このオバケを な: <if_woman><cs_pchero>Please! Do something about this freak!<else><cs_pchero>Please! Do something about this freak!<endif>

18.<if_woman>「すごい！ すごい！| <cs_pchero>ちゃん 強ーい: <if_woman>Amazing! Amazing!<cs_pchero>You're so strong! Thank you. You're a big|help!<else>Amazing! Amazing!<cs_pchero>You're so strong! Thank you. You're a big|help!<endif>

19.<if_woman>「それじゃ 私は 研究用の素材を探してくるね。| <cs_p: <if_woman>Well, I'll be looking for materials for my|research...<cs_pchero>You wait there...<else>Well, I'll be looking for materials for my|research...<cs_pchero>He was waiting there.<endif>

20.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん 見て！| 研究素材の鉱石が: <if_woman><cs_pchero>Hey, look! I found the ore for the research|material!<else><cs_pchero>Hey, look! I found the ore for the research|material!<endif>

21.<if_woman>「ああっ！ 危ない！！| <cs_pchero>ちゃん うし: <if_woman>Aah! Look out!<cs_pchero>Hey, behind you!<else>Aah! Look out!<cs_pchero>Hey, back here!<endif>

23.「……死相が出ていると 言っただろう。| 人の忠告は ちゃんと聞くんだな。: ... You said he was dying. I'll take your|advice...

24.「シェリル！ どうして ここへ！？: Cheryl! What are you doing here?

25.「お前が 研究院を追放されると聞いて| いやみのひとつでも 言ってやろうと思って: When I heard you were being expelled from the|institute, I thought I'd give you a little|grief...

26.「……私も あなたに言いたいことがあるわ！: ... I have something to say to you too!

27.「王立研究院の門を たたいたとき| 一緒に 大賢者になろうって誓った……| あの:
When we knocked on the door of the Royal|Academy, we swore we'd become great sages|together. You've forgotten that promise,|
|haven't you?

29.「自分の 恵まれた才能を活かさず| ふらふら 遊んでばっかり……！| 私みたいな:
All you do is play around and don't take|advantage of the talents you've been blessed|with! Have you never thought about the|
|feelings of people like me?

31.「お前の 戯言など聞きたくない！！| 出来の悪い 愚者のお前に 何がわかる！？|: I don't want to hear your bullshit! I don't|want to hear your nonsense! You can't|possibly know what I'm going through!

32.「……それとも お前は| 今でも 自分が 大賢者になれると| 本気で思っているの: Or... Or do you still really think you can be|the greatest sage of all time?

33.「なれるよ。私は 絶対になる。| ふたりで夢見た 大賢者に……！: I... I'll never... I'll be the great sage we|both dreamed of.

34.「ふっ 笑わせてくれる……。| お前は 大賢者になど なれん。| かなわぬ夢など: You make me laugh. You'll never be a great|sage. You'll never be a wise man.

35.「早々に あきらめろ。| 忠告だけは しておいてやる。: I'm afraid you're gonna have to... Just a|word of advice...

36.「シェリル……！| 私は あなたのこと 待ってるから| いつでも 王立研究院に: Cheryl...! I'll be waiting for you, and you|can always come back to the Royal Academy!

37.「シェリルは 意志の強いコだったけど| あんな 冷たいコじゃなかったわ……。|: Cheryl was a strong-willed girl, but she|wasn't that cold. I don't understand.

38.<if_woman>「ごめんね <cs_pchero>ちゃん。| 変なとこ 見せ: <if_woman>I'm sorry<cs_pchero>I'm sorry. I'm sorry you had to see that.|Let's go back to the Royal Academy, shall we?<else>I'm sorry<cs_pchero>Kun. I'm sorry to show you such a strange|place. Let's go back to the Royal Academy,|shall we?<endif>
